name: Sapiens International Corporation
description: Sapiens International Corporation is a global provider of software solutions for the insurance and financial services industries. Founded in 1982 and headquartered in Holon, Israel, Sapiens offers a wide array of software products and services to help organizations streamline their operations, manage risks, and enhance customer engagement. The company specializes in software solutions for property and casualty, life, and annuity insurance sectors, as well as reinsurance and other financial services. Sapiens’ offerings include policy administration systems, claims management, digital engagement platforms, and analytics solutions. Through its innovative technology, Sapiens empowers insurance and financial institutions to adapt to the ever-evolving market demands, improve operational efficiency, and ensure compliance with regulatory requirements. The company has a strong commitment to customer success and collaborates closely with clients to deliver tailored solutions that meet their unique business needs. With a global presence and a diverse client base, Sapiens is positioned to capitalize on the growing demand for digital transformation in the insurance and financial services industries.
